mapper.insert: insert into db_productdevelopforson (SEQUENCEID, FATHINDEXID, PRODUCTID, SAVENUM, SELLPRICE, COSTPRICE, WEIGHT, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURENAME, 'QUOTE', MINNUM, CHASEOPER, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPENFLAG, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, MONEYTYPE, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, 'NAME', ENNAME, PHOTOURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, TITLE) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fathindexid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacturename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quote,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{enname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{photourl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
